snippet.title: Dobbel Dungeon | Playtest Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist Dobbel Dungeon on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2622820/Dobbel_Dungeon/ 

Gather your party, roll your dice and embark on a quest to discover why the local wildlife has suddenly turned evil! Battle forth with a party of 3 unique heroes in this approachable tactical RPG roguelite. Fight monsters, level up your heroes and discover the big bad, all whilst making the most of your rolls!

To learn more about Dobbel Dungeon and Gamepie, visit:
►Website: https://gamepiegames.com/   
►Twitter / X: https://twitter.com/GamepieGames  
►TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@dobbel.dungeon
